VARIABLES.NAME: request_token
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The request token for this particular Authentication request, this is only unique to your Application

VARIABLES.NAME: request_permissions
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: A array of permissions that the Application is requesting to the user

VARIABLES.NAME: status
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The status of the Request Token, this can either be 'ACTIVE', 'BLOCKED' or 'EXPIRED', unknown states will be 'UNKNOWN'

VARIABLES.NAME: authentication_url
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The URL that the user must access in order to authenticate to your Application

VARIABLES.NAME: expires_timestamp
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The Unix Timestamp for when this request token expires
